posts.post_title: FS - T206 Waddell and Griffith Graded
posts.post_content:
PSA 2 (MC) Waddell Throwing $75 SOLD shipped
SGC 20 Griffith Portrait $55 SOLD (front is beautiful, unfortunately someone wanted to express their artistic flair on the back)

Purchase both for $120 shipped. Checks or paypal f/f. 

Thanks for looking and let me know if you have any questions or interest. 

Dave
Griffith sold pending payment. Waddell still available. Thanks. Dave
